text: Hi Tom great stuff I'm really up for giving you as much insight as possible as to what the industry is like and then helping you get what you need out of the ementor program. If you could let me know what you'd like to get out of the program I will have a think as to where I can help. Is there anything you'd like to know about me or the movies/projects I've worked on so far?

I’m mostly looking for guidance on how to find my way in to the industry and what level of work is expected from someone applying straight out of uni. 
I’m currently doing my MA in animation so I’m hoping to reach the role of an animator eventually but I’m not naive enough to think I’ll walk straight in to that role. How did you start off? In what roles do people tend to have the most success in terms of progression?
It would be great to know a bit more about your role specifically though and what projects you’ve worked on.
